Subtitles.wellcome:
Alright, new adventurer! Now we're going to go to into that forest. 
But be careful, there are monsters over there. 
Let's go!

Menu.start:

Here is a magic world with so many adventures to go. 
[MENU]

Descriptions.humans:
If you want to be adaptable, this race is perfect to you! 
The humans are good learning new things and using all kind of weapons. 
They living as in small civilizations as in big cities, and 
can learning any language.
Descriptions.dwarves:
The dwarves are masters building anything. 
They making the most powerful weapons in any civilization, and 
working in the mines obtaining the most valuable ores. 
But these armorers can be a bit unstable at times.
